explanation: The time complexity for this code snippet is linear because in each iteration of the loop from i=1 to n (inclusive), one operation `factorial *= i` occurs which does a constant amount of work, so O(n) where 'n' refers to num here; there are no nested loops or recursive calls. The space complexity is O(1), as we use only a fixed number of variables and the call stack remains unchanged during execution (excluding function arguments).
